title: Why did i join this college?!?!?!??!?!
content: same as title.....just wanted to vent out

comments.body: As a first year I agree

First of all college is stressful and Engineering is the most stressful degree! 

Initial days will be tough, go with the flow, do things on your own, and try to grow everyday. 

Manage your time well , I regret not able to managed time better..
Stay strong, you'll get used to engineering and PES
If you are in CS, you ll thanks it's placements lol
As a first year, I don't get all the negative stuff I was told. I found great people, the course is manageable(B.Tech), and there's fun events going on week in week out. I don't get the complaining.
Not for my batch you won't.. placements are shit cause the job market is shit
It's weird I think the same thing but I also like the uni in a way
First year is far more chill compared to second year
Which batch are you talking about?
That's why I didn't put PES in my choice list in CET hehe, and joined RVCE this clg is peace of mind.
bro what are you smoking bro rvce is not peace of mind lmao
why go college bro take an online course and sleep
